subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees got a strong outing by Andy Pettitte, and an outburst of offense, but with limited options available amid a banged-up and overused group of relievers, it was not enough.
snippet: The Yankees got a strong outing by Andy Pettitte, and an outburst of offense, but with limited options available amid a banged-up and overused group of relievers, it was not enough.
